attributes.action: properly represent the interests of the british people by coming out and publicly supporting the bravest of all elected representatives (out of the same mould as our only honest politician, ever, Mr Enoch Powell), Mr Geert Wilder, in his fight against Islamisation of The Netherlands.  He is right, our politicians here know he is right, and this country should be doing exactly what he says regarding the removal of Islamisation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Absolutely nothing more needs to be said.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
